entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
